attributes.action: Make TfL services public funded/free at the point of service
attributes.additional_details: The majority of students in London, Primary, Secondary and University, use some form of public transport to get to school, costing hundreds of Pounds per year
attributes.background: Nationalise Transport fro London services and completely fund them with public funds

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
